i18n: 大家好，欢迎来到我们的阅读时间
s: Hi everyone , welcome to our reading time

i18n: 这就是码头
s: This is marina

i18n: 今天我们要读一读小原则
s: Today we are going to read the little princ

i18n: 第一章
s: Chapter ONE

i18n: 一次是在我六岁的时候
s: Once when i was six years old

i18n: 我在一片嘘声中看到了一张宏伟的画面
s: I saw a magnificent picture in a boo

i18n: 来自 natur 的真实故事
s: Called true stories from natur

i18n: 关于原初邪恶森林
s: About the prime evil forest

i18n: 那是一条蟒蛇的照片
s: It was a picture of a boa constricto

i18n: 吞食动物的行为
s: In the act of swallowing an animal

i18n: 这是图纸的副本
s: Here IS A COPY OF THE DRAWING

i18n: 在嘘声中
s: In the boo

i18n: 它说：蟒蛇吞下他们的猎物 whol
s: It said : boa constrictors swallow their prey whol

i18n: 无需咀嚼
s: Without chewing it

i18n: 之后他们就不能移动了
s: After that they are not able to move

i18n: 他们睡过消化所需的六个月
s: And they sleep through the six months that they need for digestion

i18n: 我沉思着
s: I pondered deepl

i18n: 然后穿越丛林的冒险
s: Then over the adventures of the jungle

i18n: 在用彩色铅笔工作一番之后
s: And after some work with a colored pencil

i18n: 我成功地画了我的第一幅画
s: I SUCCEEDED IN MAKING MY FIRST DRAWING

i18n: 我的第一名
s: My join number one

i18n: 它看起来像这样
s: It looked like this

i18n: 我向大人们展示了我的杰作
s: I showed my masterpiece to the grown ups

i18n: 并问他们这幅画是否吓到了他们
s: And asked them whether the drawing frightened them

i18n: 但他们害怕地回答
s: But they answered frightened

i18n: 为什么有人应该被帽子吓到
s: Why SHOULD ANYONE BE FRIGHTENED BY A HAT

i18n: 我的画不是一顶帽子的图片
s: My drawing was not a picture of a hat

i18n: 那是一张蟒蛇消化大象的照片
s: It WAS A PICTURE OF A BOA CONSTRICTOR DIGESTING AN ELEPHANT

i18n: 但是由于大人们无法理解它
s: But since the grown ups were not able to understand it

i18n: 我又画了一幅画
s: I made another drawing

i18n: 我画了 BOA 构造器的内部
s: I DREW THE INSIDE OF THE BOA CONSTRUCTOR

i18n: 这样大人们才能看得清楚
s: So that the grown ups could see it clearly

i18n: 他们总是需要解释事情
s: They always need to have things explained

i18n: 我的第二幅画是这样的
s: My drawing number two looked like this

i18n: 这次大人们的反应是劝我
s: The grown ups response this time was to advise m

i18n: 放下我对蟒蛇的画作
s: To lay aside my drawings of boa constrictors

i18n: 无论是从内部还是从外部
s: Whether from the inside or the outside

i18n: 转而致力于地理
s: And devote myself instead to geography

i18n: 历史、算术和语法
s: History , arithmetic and grammar

i18n: 这就是为什么在六岁时
s: That is why at the age of six

i18n: 我放弃了本来可能辉煌的画家生涯
s: I give up what might have been a magnificent career as a painter

i18n: 我对我的加入号码失败感到沮丧
s: I had been disheartened by the failure of my join number on

i18n: 我的第二个加入
s: And my join number two

i18n: 大人自己永远无法理解任何事情
s: Grown ups never understand anything by themselves

i18n: 孩子们总是永远向他们解释事情是令人厌烦的
s: And it is tiresome for children to be always and forever explaining things to them

i18n: 所以后来我选择了另一个专业
s: So then i chose another professio

i18n: 并学习驾驶 airplant
s: And learn to pilot airplants

i18n: 我飞遍了世界各地
s: I have flown a little over all parts of the world

i18n: 确实，地理对 m 非常有用
s: And it is true that geography has been very useful to m

i18n: 一目了然
s: At a glance

i18n: 我可以区分中国和亚利松
s: I can distinguish china from arizon

i18n: 如果一个人在黑夜迷路
s: If one gets lost in the night

i18n: 这些知识很有价值
s: Such knowledge is valuable

i18n: 在今生的过程中
s: In THE COURSE OF THIS LIFE

i18n: 我遇到过很多次
s: I have had a great many encounter

i18n: 与很多人在一起
s: With A GREAT MANY PEOPLE

i18n: 谁曾关心过重要的事情
s: Who have been concerned with matters of consequence

i18n: 我在成年人中生活了很多
s: I have lived a great deal among grown ups

i18n: 我看到他们近在咫尺
s: I have seen them immediately close at hand

i18n: 而这种情况并没有因为堆积而得到太大改善
s: And that hasn't much improved by piling of them

i18n: 每当我遇到他们中的一个
s: Whenever i met one of them

i18n: 在我看来，谁是完全清楚的
s: Who seemed to me at all clear sided

i18n: 我尝试了向他展示我的 1 号加入的实验
s: I tried the experiment of showing him my join number one

i18n: 我一直保持着
s: Which i have always kept

i18n: 我会试着找出答案
s: I would try to find out

i18n: 所以，如果这是一个真正有理解力的人
s: So if this was a person of true understanding

i18n: 但不管是谁
s: But whoever it was

i18n: 他或她总是会说
s: He or she would always say

i18n: 那是一顶帽子
s: That is a hat

i18n: 那我就永远不会和那个人谈论蟒蛇
s: Then i would never talk to that person about boa constrictors

i18n: 或者为邪恶森林或星星
s: Or prime evil forests or stars

i18n: 我会把自己降低到他的水平
s: I would bring myself down to his level

i18n: 我会和他谈论桥牌和高尔夫，以及政治和领带
s: I would talk to him about bridge and golf , and politics and neckties

i18n: 长大后会很高兴遇到这样一个明智的人
s: And the growing up would be greatly pleased to have met such a sensible man

i18n: 感谢您的收听
s: Thank you for listenin

i18n: 下次我们要读第二章
s: Next time we are going to read the chapter two

i18n: 下次再见 再见
s: See YOU NEXT TIME BYE BYE
